top_stories.title: SignalWire Releases Open Source SDK for Voice AI
top_stories.description: SignalWire, the leader in Programmable Unified Communications (PUC), today announced the open beta of its fully open source Call Fabric SDK and Reference App. This milestone release empowers developers to quickly build, customize, and launch modern communications apps, including intelligent solutions powered by the SignalWire Voice AI Agent across web,... The post SignalWire Releases Open Source SDK for Voice AI first appeared on AI-Tech Park.
top_stories.author: Business Wire
top_stories.content: SignalWire, the leader in Programmable Unified Communications (PUC), today announced the open beta of its fully open source Call Fabric SDK and Reference App. This milestone release empowers developers to quickly build, customize, and launch modern communications apps, including intelligent solutions powered by the SignalWire Voice AI Agent across web,... The post SignalWire Releases Open Source SDK for Voice AI first appeared on AI-Tech Park.

top_stories.title: Gate-level emulation of an Intel 4004 in 4004 bytes of C
top_stories.description: A feature-complete gate-level microcoded Intel 4004 in 4004 bytes of C, capable of emulating the original Busicom calculator ROM for which the chip was originally designed.
top_stories.content: A feature-complete gate-level microcoded Intel 4004 in 4004 bytes of C, capable of emulating the original Busicom calculator ROM for which the chip was originally designed.

top_stories.title: New Report: The Architectural Patterns of Financial AI
top_stories.description: At Bankwell Bank, a new employee named Sarah works around the clock. She responds to loan applicants via email and SMS in under three minutes, gathers missing documents, and hands a perfectly structured file to her human colleagues. She has re-activated roughly half of the bank’s otherwise lost applicants and saved loan officers 90% ofContinue reading "New Report: The Architectural Patterns of Financial AI" The post New Report: The Architectural Patterns of Financial AI appeared first on...

top_stories.title: Fighting Style Collapse: Reinforcement Learning with Bit-LoRA for LLM Style Personalization
top_stories.description: Reward dropout and Bit-LoRA regularization effects.AbstractHere I introduce and experiment with a novel reinforcement learning-based framework for LLM style personalization that uniquely addresses the challenge of style collapse. Unlike existing few-shot prompting methods, this approach ensures both high style fidelity and remarkable diversity, critically requiring only minimal data. Central is a novel style reward dropout mechanism, seamlessly integrated with continuous style similarity...
top_stories.author: Roman S
top_stories.content: Reward dropout and Bit-LoRA regularization effects.AbstractHere I introduce and experiment with a novel reinforcement learning-based framework for LLM style personalization that uniquely addresses the challenge of style collapse. Unlike existing few-shot prompting methods, this approach ensures both high style fidelity and remarkable diversity, critically requiring only minimal data. Central is a novel style reward dropout mechanism, seamlessly integrated with continuous style similarity...

top_stories.title: Differentiable Economics: Strategic Behavior, Mechanisms, and Machine Learning
top_stories.description: Recent advances have made machine learning a tool for solving longstanding problems in economics.
top_stories.author: David C. Parkes
top_stories.content: Recent advances have made machine learning a tool for solving longstanding problems in economics.
